title: 001-Health_Basics
summary: This card introduces fundamental health principles that everyone should know to maintain optimal wellness throughout their life.
latentAbility: Provides basic health insights for daily wellness decisions.

questions.text: What is the most important factor for maintaining good health?
Which of these is a key component of wellness?
options: Balancing physical, mental, and social well-being
questions.correct: Balancing physical, mental, and social well-being
